column1: #Text=Anything for some facetime on the G&M?
#Text=As a naturalized citizen from CHINA, I refute your opinion.
#Text=It's a tax on foreign capital that 'earned' in a country with low ethical and moral business practices... nothing more nothing less.
#Text=P.S., note that our Publicly insured and backed banks [provides mortgages with no income verification, a benefit not offered to Canadians or permanent residents...
